description: This Java class defines a Spring Boot configuration for setting up Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS). It creates a CorsFilter bean that allows specified frontend origins (configured via environment variable or default to localhost:3000) to access the backend resources, supporting all headers and methods.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that defines CORS policy allowing frontend applications to communicate with the backend.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates a CorsFilter bean that sets CORS configuration allowing specified origin, headers, and methods.
